title: Ticket #2983: RFE: Allow Collector to discard queries where client has given up
description:
At high scale and high query rates, the condor_collector can become backed up responding to queries.

Clients querying the collector will only wait for QUERY_TIMEOUT seconds, and may retry.

Currently, the collector has no way to know it has fallen behind and will be responding to queries where the client has given up.

Proposal, have the client provide a hint to the collector and allow the collector to disregard queries for which the client has likely given up.

Note: When clients retry with large queries (output is large), the collector will not gracefully recover.
